snippet.title: One True Path - Teaser#3
snippet.description:
One True Path is InnerspaceVR’s latest and most ambitious title to date in their critically-acclaimed mind-bending style. The game is full of surprises to delight new players and fans of old-school paper-and-pencil adventuring alike. 

Over the next few weeks we’ll be gradually unveiling more about the game with a series of mysterious teasers and reveals until Part 1 of the game becomes available in early access by the end of September!

---

"Magical sword in hand, slash your way through the necromantic Army of Evil  led by the demonic Grey Knight.
A kingdom in darkness. An ancient evil risen from cursèd earth. The dead walk, and talk, and kill, and kill, and only you and your trusty blade can stop it.
Based on the bestselling gamebook ‘Army of Evil’ from the Fiendish Fates© series, an old-school adventure with new blood to spill and new scores to settle…"

---

To stay up to date about One True Path, join the community:
Our Discord: http://discord.gg/NV9VZeYAa9
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@innerspacevr
X: https://x.com/innerspacevr
https://www.innerspacevr.com/one-true-path
